movie.title: Holt
movie.plot: On the 17th of December 1967, Australia's Prime Minister, Harold Holt, disappeared without a trace - but not originally. Someone wants the Prime Minister dead and only time travel will allow it.

movie.title: American Animals
movie.plot: Four young men mistake their lives for a movie and attempt one of the most audacious heists in U.S. history.
